turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order from the Peet's Coffee on Westwood Boulevard in Los Angeles.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what did you want to order from Peet's?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to order a cafe Aulait with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you have a milk preference for your drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. So to confirm, you'd like to order a medium cafe Aulait with almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can I add any other flavors?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What flavor did you want to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can we add some ginger spice?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Unfortunately, there is no ginger spice at Peet's at the moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Vanilla, Sugar-free vanilla, Maple, Hazelnut, Sugar-free chocolate sauce, Cinnabon Bun.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And so you wanted a medium cafe Aulaite with almond milk and maple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total for your order will be $4.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Peet's on Westwood Boulevard. It should be ready for pick up in 9 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.
